snippet: A pair of barriers that were placed on the 13th floor of Police Headquarters had an aura of something official, but upon closer inspection, the messages on them told a different story.
abstract: Pair of bogus barriers, like the ones used in an Occupy Wall Street protest, mysteriously appear on the 13th floor of Police Headquarters in New York City; timing roughly coincides with the first anniversary of a minutely planned police raid that cleared protesters from their encampment in Zuccotti Park one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: A pair of barriers that were placed on the 13th floor of Police Headquarters had an aura of something official, but upon closer inspection, the messages on them told a different story.

headline.seo: Occupy Wall Street Figures In Barrier Mystery at Police Headquarters
headline.main: Whodunit at Police Headquarters: Occupy Wall Street Figures in Barrier Mystery
headline.print_headline: Whodunit at Police Headquarters: Occupy Accuses Police
